include/ulib/xml/libxml2/transforms.h

00001 // ============================================================================
00002 //
00003 // = LIBRARY
00004 //    ulib - c++ library

00013 
00014 #ifndef ULIB_DSIG_TRANSFORM_H
00015 #define ULIB_DSIG_TRANSFORM_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/container/vector.h>
00018 #include <ulib/xml/libxml2/document.h>
00019 
00020 #include <libxml/uri.h>
00021 #include <libxml/xmlIO.h>
00022 
00023 class UDSIGContext;
00024 class UReferenceCtx;
00025 class UTransformCtx;
00026 
00027 class UBaseTransform {
00028 public:
00029 
00030         // Check for memory error
00031         U_MEMORY_TEST
00032 
00033         // Allocator e Deallocator
00034         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00035         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00036 
00037         // The transform usage bit mask
00038 
00039         enum Usage {
00040         //      NONE              = 0x0000, // usage is unknown or undefined
00041                 DSIG              = 0x0001, // Transform could be used in <dsig:Transform>
00042                 C14N              = 0x0002, // Transform could be used in <dsig:CanonicalizationMethod>
00043                 DIGEST    = 0x0004, // Transform could be used in <dsig:DigestMethod>
00044                 SIGNATURE  = 0x0008, // Transform could be used in <dsig:SignatureMethod>
00045                 ENCRYPTION = 0x0010, // Transform could be used in <enc:EncryptionMethod>
00046                 ANY               = 0xFFFF  // Transform could be used for operation
00047         };
00048 
00049         // The transform execution status
00050 
00051         enum State {
00052         //      NONE            = 0,    // status unknown
00053                 WORKING = 1,    // transform is executed
00054                 FINISHED = 2,   // transform finished
00055                 OK                      = 3,    // transform succeeded
00056                 FAIL            = 4     // transform failed (an error occur)
00057         };
00058 
00059         // The transform operation
00060 
00061         enum Operation {
00062         //      NONE            = 0,    // operation is unknown
00063                 ENCODE  = 1,    // encode operation (for base64 transform)
00064                 DECODE  = 2,    // decode operation (for base64 transform)
00065                 SIGN            = 3,    // sign or digest operation
00066                 VERIFY  = 4,    // verification of signature or digest operation
00067                 ENCRYPT = 5,    // encryption operation
00068                 DECRYPT = 6,    // decryption operation
00069         };
00070 
00071         // COSTRUTTORI
00072 
00073         UBaseTransform()
00074                 {
00075                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UBaseTransform, "", 0)
00076 
00077                 status   = 0;
00078                 operation = 0;
00079                 }
00080 
00081         virtual ~UBaseTransform()
00082                 {
00083                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UBaseTransform)
00084                 }
00085 
00086         // method VIRTUAL to define
00087 
00088         virtual int                       usage() = 0;  // the allowed transforms usages
00089         virtual const char* name()  = 0;        // the transform's name
00090         virtual const char* href()  = 0;        // the transform's identification string (href)
00091 
00092         virtual bool verify()                                                   { return true; } // the verify method (for digest and signature transforms)
00093         virtual bool setKey(xmlNodePtr node)            { return true; } // the set key method
00094         virtual bool popBin(xmlNodePtr node)            { return true; } // the binary data "pop from chain" procesing method
00095         virtual bool popXml(xmlNodePtr node)            { return true; } // the XML data "pop from chain" procesing method
00096         virtual bool execute(xmlNodePtr node)           { return true; } // the low level data processing method used by default pushBin,popBin,pushXml and popXml
00097         virtual bool pushBin(xmlNodePtr node)           { return true; } // the binary data "push thru chain" processing method
00098         virtual bool pushXml(xmlNodePtr node)           { return true; } // the XML data "push thru chain" processing method
00099         virtual bool readNode(xmlNodePtr node)          { return true; } // the XML node read method
00100         virtual bool writeNode(xmlNodePtr node) { return true; } // the XML node write method
00101         virtual bool setKeyReq(xmlNodePtr node) { return true; } // the set key requirements method
00102         virtual bool getDataType(xmlNodePtr node)       { return true; } // the input/output data type query method
00103 
00104 #ifdef DEBUG
00105         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00106 #endif
00107 
00108 protected:
00109         int status;                             //      the current status
00110         int operation;                  //      the transform's operation
00111         UString inBuf;                  // the input binary data buffer
00112         UString outBuf;         // the output binary data buffer
00113         xmlNodePtr inNodes;     // the input XML nodes
00114         xmlNodePtr outNodes; // the output XML nodes
00115         xmlNodePtr hereNode; // the pointer to transform's <dsig:Transform /> node
00116 
00117 private:
00118         UBaseTransform(const UBaseTransform&)            {}
00119         UBaseTransform& operator=(const UBaseTransform&) { return *this; }
00120 
00121         friend class UDSIGContext;
00122         friend class UTransformCtx;
00123         friend class UReferenceCtx;
00124 };
00125 
00126 /*
00127  * The Base64 transform klass (http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/#sec-Base-64).
00128  * The normative specification for base64 decoding transforms is RFC 2045
00129  * (http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2045.txt). The base64 Transform element has 
00130  * no content. The input is decoded by the algorithms. This transform is 
00131  * useful if an application needs to sign the raw data associated with 
00132  * the encoded content of an element.
00133  */
00134 
00135 class UTranformBase64 : public UBaseTransform {
00136 public:
00137 
00138         // COSTRUTTORI
00139 
00140         UTranformBase64()
00141                 {
00142                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UTranformBase64, "", 0)
00143                 }
00144 
00145         virtual ~UTranformBase64()
00146                 {
00147                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UTranformBase64)
00148                 }
00149 
00150         // define method VIRTUAL of class UBaseTransform
00151 
00152         virtual int                       usage() { return _usage; } // the allowed transforms usages
00153         virtual const char* name()  { return _name;  } // the transform's name
00154         virtual const char* href()  { return _href;  } // the transform's identification string (href)
00155 
00156 #ifdef DEBUG
00157         const char* dump(bool reset) const { return UBaseTransform::dump(reset); }
00158 #endif
00159 
00160 protected:
00161         static int _usage;                // the allowed transforms usages
00162         static const char* _name; // the transform's name
00163         static const char* _href; // the transform's identification string (href)
00164 
00165 private:
00166         UTranformBase64(const UTranformBase64&) : UBaseTransform() {}
00167         UTranformBase64& operator=(const UTranformBase64&)                        { return *this; }
00168 
00169         friend class UDSIGContext;
00170         friend class UTransformCtx;
00171         friend class UReferenceCtx;
00172 };
00173 
00174 // Inclusive (regular) canonicalization that omits comments transform class
00175 // (http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/#sec-c14nAlg and http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xml-c14n-20010315)
00176

00196         virtual const char* href()  { return _href;  } // the transform's identification string (href)
00197 
00198         virtual bool popBin(xmlNodePtr node)            { return false; } // the binary data "pop from chain" procesing method
00199         virtual bool pushXml(xmlNodePtr node)           { return false; } // the XML data "push thru chain" processing method

00218 };

00456 /*
00457  * Input I/O callback list
00458  */
00459 
00460 class UIOCallback {
00461 public:
00462 
00463         // Check for memory error
00464         U_MEMORY_TEST
00465 
00466         // Allocator e Deallocator
00467         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00468         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00469 
00470         // COSTRUTTORI
00471 
00472         UIOCallback(xmlInputMatchCallback matchFunc,
00473                                         xmlInputOpenCallback  openFunc,
00474                                         xmlInputReadCallback  readFunc,
00475                                         xmlInputCloseCallback closeFunc)
00476                 {
00477                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UIOCallback, "%p,%p,%p,%p", matchFunc, openFunc, readFunc, closeFunc)
00478 
00479 
00480                 matchcallback = matchFunc;
00481                 opencallback  = openFunc;
00482                 readcallback  = readFunc; 
00483                 closecallback = closeFunc;
00484                 }
00485 
00486         ~UIOCallback()
00487                 {
00488                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UIOCallback)
00489                 }
00490 
00491 #ifdef DEBUG
00492         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00493 #endif
00494 
00495 protected:
00496         xmlInputMatchCallback matchcallback;
00497         xmlInputOpenCallback  opencallback;
00498         xmlInputReadCallback  readcallback;
00499         xmlInputCloseCallback closecallback;
00500 
00501 private:
00502         UIOCallback(const UIOCallback&)            {}
00503         UIOCallback& operator=(const UIOCallback&) { return *this; }
00504 
00505         friend class UTranformInputURI;
00506 };
